Reference

All functions

CCLE_expression()

Gene expression in CCLE Tumors

CT_correlated_genes()

Gene correlations in CCLE cancer cell lines

CT_genes

CT genes description table

DAC_induction()

Gene expression in cells treated or not by a demethylating agent

GTEX_expression()

Gene expression in normal tissues (GTEx)

HPA_cell_type_expression()

Gene expression in different human cell types

TCGA_expression()

Gene expression in TCGA tumors

TCGA_methylation_expression_correlation()

Methylation-Expression correlation of any genes in TCGA samples

all_genes

All genes description table

check_names()

Check spelling of entered variables

embryo_expression()

Gene expression in human embryos

embryos_mean_methylation()

Promoter methylation of any gene in early embryos

fetal_germcell_mean_methylation()

Promoter methylation of any gene in fetal germ cells

fetal_germcells_expression()

Gene expression in fetal germ cells

hESC_expression()

Gene expression in human embryonic stem cells

hESC_mean_methylation()

Promoter methylation of any gene in hESC

normal_tissue_expression_multimapping()

Expression values (TPM) of genes in normal tissues with or without multimapping

normal_tissues_mean_methylation()

Promoter methylation of any gene in normal tissues

normal_tissues_methylation()

Methylation of CpGs located in promoters in normal tissues

oocytes_expression()

Gene expression in oocytes

prepare_TCGA_methylation_expression()

Prepare methylation and expression data of a gene in TCGA tumors

set_fontsize()

Determine font size

subset_database()

Subset databases

testis_expression()

Gene expression in testis cells
